name: Block Puzzle - Cute Emoji
description:
FEATURES:
- PLAY YOUR BEST MOVE. You can watch other's best move through the Leaderboard system.
- MULTIPLE THEMES! There are 2 themes, one is Emoji and one is Woodie. Let's try them.
- NO WIFI? NO PROBLEM! Enjoy puzzle anytime, anywhere!
- FREE TO PLAY & Suitable for all ages.
- NO penalties & time limits; You can enjoy Block Puzzle at your own place!

Have fun!
